description: Manage your Todoist tasks, projects, and comments seamlessly using natural language commands. Create, update, complete, and organize tasks and projects efficiently with support for bulk operations and rich task attributes. Enhance productivity by integrating Todoist task management directly into your workflow.

capabilities.name: todoist_task_create
capabilities.description: Create a new task in Todoist with optional description, due date, priority, labels, deadline, project, and section

capabilities.name: todoist_task_get
capabilities.description: Retrieve tasks from Todoist with optional filtering or get a specific task by ID

capabilities.name: todoist_task_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing task found by ID or partial name search. Supports updating content, description, due date, priority, labels, deadline, project, and section

capabilities.name: todoist_task_delete
capabilities.description: Delete a task found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

capabilities.name: todoist_task_complete
capabilities.description: Mark a task as complete found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

capabilities.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_create
capabilities.description: Create multiple tasks at once for improved efficiency. Each task can have full attributes like individual task creation.

capabilities.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_update
capabilities.description: Update multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Very efficient for updating many tasks with the same changes.

capabilities.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_delete
capabilities.description: Delete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Use with caution - this will permanently delete matching tasks.

capabilities.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_complete
capabilities.description: Complete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Efficiently mark many tasks as done.

capabilities.name: todoist_project_get
capabilities.description: Get a list of all projects from Todoist with their IDs and names

capabilities.name: todoist_section_get
capabilities.description: Get a list of sections within a project from Todoist with their IDs and names

capabilities.name: todoist_project_create
capabilities.description: Create a new project in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_section_create
capabilities.description: Create a new section within a project in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_comment_create
capabilities.description: Add a comment to a task in Todoist by task ID or task name

capabilities.name: todoist_comment_get
capabilities.description: Get comments for a task or project in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_label_get
capabilities.description: Get all labels in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_label_create
capabilities.description: Create a new label in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_label_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing label in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_label_delete
capabilities.description: Delete a label from Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_label_stats
capabilities.description: Get usage statistics for all labels in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_subtask_create
capabilities.description: Create a new subtask under a parent task in Todoist

capabilities.name: todoist_subtasks_bulk_create
capabilities.description: Create multiple subtasks under a parent task in a single operation

capabilities.name: todoist_task_convert_to_subtask
capabilities.description: Convert an existing task to a subtask of another task

capabilities.name: todoist_subtask_promote
capabilities.description: Promote a subtask to a main task (remove parent relationship)

capabilities.name: todoist_task_hierarchy_get
capabilities.description: Get a task with all its subtasks in a hierarchical structure

capabilities.name: todoist_test_connection
capabilities.description: Test the connection to Todoist API and verify API token validity

capabilities.name: todoist_test_all_features
capabilities.description: Run comprehensive tests on all Todoist MCP features to verify functionality

capabilities.name: todoist_test_performance
capabilities.description: Measure performance and response times of Todoist API operations
